articles.author: Josh Edwards
articles.title: NFL combine 2023 results: Live updates as cornerbacks, safeties run 40-yard dash, compete in drills - CBS Sports
articles.description: Catch up with everything that happened on the field at the combine in Indianapolis on Thursday and Friday
articles.content: If the defensive linemen, edge rusher, and linebacker workouts were any indication, this year's batch of St. Elmo's cocktail sauce contains superpowers that boost athleticism. Collectively, the defen… [+907 chars]
